title: conferred on it by section 12(2) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Migration of Participating Securities
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Migration of Participating Securities 

Act 2019 (Appointed Date) (Section 10) Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on the 5th day of March 2021. 

Definitions and interpretation

title: conferred on it by section 12(2) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: 2. (1) In this Order, “Act of 2019” means the Migration of Participating
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order, “Act of 2019” means the Migration of Participating 

Securities Act 2019 (No. 50 of 2019). 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and which is also used 
in the Act of 2019 has the same meaning in this Order as it has in the Act of
text_norm: 2 (1) order act 2019 mean migration participating security act 2019 (no 50 2019) (2) word expression used order also used act 2019 meaning order act

title: conferred on it by section 12(2) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: Appointed date

title: conferred on it by section 12(2) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: 3. The 10th day of March 2021 at 17:00 hours is appointed as the date for
text_raw:
3. The 10th day of March 2021 at 17:00 hours is appointed as the date for 
the purposes of section 10(1) and 10(3) of the Act of 2019, in respect of all 
participating issuers. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [99] 3 

GIVEN under the common seal of Irish Stock Exchange plc, 

acting in its capacity as the Listing Authority 

 5 March 2021 

Witnesses to the application of the common seal: 

DARYL BYRNE, 

Director 
Irish Stock Exchange plc 

AISLING MCARDLE, 
Authorised Signatory 
Irish Stock Exchange plc 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [99]

title: conferred on it by section 12(2) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Order and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Order and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order appoints the date before which the statement referred to in section 
10(1) or 10(3) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act 2019, as the case 
may be, must be furnished to the Registrar of Companies or, as appropriate, to 
the Listing Authority by a participating issuer that wishes to consent to a 
migration referred to in section 4(1) of that Act of the relevant participating 
securities in that issuer. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [99] 5
